A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi doesn't hold up well in terms of Hollywood story or Star Wars continuity. It does bring something new to the saga\, in the same way that Transformers 4 brought a fresh type of garbage to a dying franchise too. I know that\, as fans of the original films\, you will see the movie like I did. However\, you will either regret it or find value in the warm embrace of the nostalgia that is so powerful because the old films were so much better than this one.
